title: Standing Heel Raises
description: While standing, raise up on your toes as you lift your heels off the ground while holding on to something stationary for balance if needed.

title: Ankle Circles
description: Move your ankle in a circular pattern one direction for several repetitions and then reverse the direction.

title: Ankle ABC's
description: While in a seated position, write out the alphabet in the air with your big toe whilst moving your ankle.

title: Seated Calf Stretch
description: While in a seated postion, use a towel or strap looped around your foot. Gently pull your foot back until a stretch is felt in your lower leg. Keep your knee straight without locking it the entire time.

title: Toe Raises
description: While standing, raise up your forefoot and toes as you bend at your ankle while holding on to something stationary for balance if needed.

title: Towel Curls
description: While seated, place a towel on the floor, place your foot on top and draw it back towards you using your toes by curling them inwards. Be sure to keep your heel in contact with the floor the entire time.

title: Towel Slides
description: While seated, place a towel on the floor, place your foot on top and slide it with your foot across the floor in an outward direction, ensure your heel is in contact with the floor the whole time.

title: Marble Pick Ups
description: Place several marbles or other small objects on the floor and pick them up using your toes and place them in a cup or bowl and repeat.

title: Heel Walk
description: While standing, raise up your toes and walk on your heels. Take a few steps forward and then a few steps backward.

title: Sidelying Inversions
description: While lying on your side with your target ankle hanging off the edge, move yourfoot upwards toward the ceiling, stretching your ankle.

title: Wrist Extension
description: Rest your arm on your thigh and bend at your wrist up and down with your palm face down. Return to original position and repeat.

title: Wrist Flexion
description: Rest your arm on your thigh and bend at your wrist up and down with your palm face up. Return to original position and repeat.

title: Hammer Pronation Supination
description: Slowly lower a hammer towards the inside and then outside of the body as shown.

title: Putty Grip
description: Place putty in your hand and squeeze it firmly and slowly. Reshape it and repeat.

title: Tendon Glides
description: Start with an open palm and then bend your fingers to a claw hand as in the upper right image. Next, return to an open palm and then to an "L", hand as shown in the bottom right image. Next, return to an open palm and then make a fist as in the bottom left image. Finally, return to an open palm and then repeat the series.

title: Finger Opposition
description: Start with an open palm and fingers fully extended. Touch tips of the first and second fingers then return to open palm, then touch the tips of the first and third fingers, etc until all fingers have touched the first finger.

title: Rubber Band Extension
description: Expand a rubber band wrapped around your fingers.

title: Ball Squeeze
description: With an elastic ball, firmly squeeze it in the palm of your hand.

title: Prayer Stretch
description: Place the palms of your hands together and press them together to stretch the wrist.

title: Wrist Supination
description: With your elbows bent by the side of your body, turn your forearm towards palm face up.

title: Chin Tuck
description: Slowly draw your head back so that your ears line up with your shoulders.

title: Cervical Side Bend
description: Tilt your head towards the side, then return back to looking straight ahead. Keep your eyes and nose pointed straight ahead the whole time.

title: Cervical Rotation
description: Turn your head towards the side then return back to looking straight ahead

title: Isometric Flexion
description: Place your fingers on your forehead and gently push your head into your fingers.

title: Upper Trap Stretch
description: While sitting in a chair, hold the seat with one hand and olace your other hand over head head to help bend it to the side. Bend your head in the opposite direction of the hand that is holding the chair seat.

title: Chin Tuck with Retraction and Towel
description: Whilst lying on your back with a small rolled up towel under your head, tuck your chin towards your chest while focusing on putting pressure on the towel with the back of your head.

title: Cervical Extension
description: Tilt your head upwards then return to looking straight ahead and repeat.

title: Levator Scapulae Stretch
description: Place your arm on the affected side behind your back and use the other hand to pull your head downward and towards the opposite side.

title: Clasped Hand Rhomboid Stretch
description: Interlace your fingers and then draw your hands forwards until a stretch is felt along your upper back.

title: Grasping Wrist Levator Scapulae Stretch
description: Grasp your arm of the affected side and pull it gently towards the opposite side in front of your body. Next, tilt your head downward and to the side looking away from the affected side until a stretch is felt.

title: Sidelying Clamshell
description: While lying on your side with your knees bent, draw up the top knee while keeping contact of your feet together. Do not let your pelvis roll back during the lifting movement.

title: Hip Abduction - Standing
description: While standing, raise your leg out to the side. Keep your knee straight and maintain your toes pointed forward the entire time. Use your arms for support if needed for balance and safety.

title: Hip Abduction - Sidelying
description: While lying on your side, slowly raise up your top leg to the side. Keep your knee straight and maintain your toes pointed forward the entire time. Keep your leg in-line with your body. The bottom leg can be bent to stabilize your body.

title: Hip Adduction Squeeze - Supine
description: Place a rolled up towel, ball or pillow between your knees and press your knees together so that you squeeze the object firmly. Hold and then release and repeat.

title: Supine Hip Abduction - Elastic Band Clams
description: Lie down on your back with your knees bent. Place an elastic band around your knees and then draw your knees apart.

title: Prone Hip Extension
description: While lying face down with your knee straight, slowly raise up leg off the ground. Maintain a straight knee the entire time.

title: Sit to Stand - No Support
description: Start by scooting close to the front of the chair.  Next, lean forward at your trunk and reach forward with your arms and rise to standing without using your hands to push off from the chair or other object. Use your arms as a counter-balance by reaching forward when in sitting and lower them as you approach standing.

title: Hip Extension - Standing
description: While standing, balance on one leg and move your other leg in a backward direction. Do not swing the leg. Perform smooth and controlled movements. Keep your trunk stable and without arching during the movement. Use your arms for support if needed for balance and safety.

title: Elastic Band - Supine Hip Abduction
description: While lying on your back, slowly bring your leg out to the side. Keep  your knee straight the entire time.

title: Half Kneel Hip Flexor Stretch
description: While kneeling, lean forward and bend your front knee until a stretch is felt along the front of the other.

title: Heel Slides - Supine
description: Lying on your back with knees straight, slide the affected heel towards your buttock as you bend your knee. Hold a gentle stretch in this position and then return to original position.

title: Long Arc Quad - High Seat
description: While seated with your knee in a bent position, slowly straighten your knee as you raise your foot upwards as shown.

title: Straight Leg Raise
description: While lying on your back, raise up your leg with a straight knee.  Keep the opposite knee bent with the foot planted on the ground.

title: Single Leg Stance
description: Stand on one leg and maintain your balance. Repeat for other leg.

title: Short Arc Quad
description: Place a rolled up towel or object under your knee and slowly straighten your knee as your raise up  your foot.

title: Seat Marching
description: While seated in a chair, lift up your foot and knee, set it down and then perform on the other leg. Repeat this alternating movement.

title: Sit to Stand - No Support
description: Start by scooting close to the front of the chair.  Next, lean forward at your trunk and reach forward with your arms and rise to standing without using your hands to push off from the chair or other object. Use your arms as a counter-balance by reaching forward when in sitting and lower them as you approach standing.

title: Standing Hamstring Curls
description: While standing, bend your knee so that your heel moves towards your buttock. Lower back down until first contact with floor and repeat. Keep knees in-line with one another.

title: Standing Marching
description: While standing, draw up your knee, set it down and then alternate to your other side. Use your arms for support if needed for balance and safety.

title: Half Kneel Hip Flexor Stretch
description: While kneeling, lean forward and bend your front knee until a stretch is felt along the front of the other.

title: Bridging
description: While lying on your back with knees bent, tighten your lower abdominals, squeeze your buttocks and then raise your buttocks off the floor/bed as creating a "Bridge" with your body. Hold and then lower yourself and repeat.

title: Lower trunk rotations - LTR
description: Lying on your back with your knees bent, gently move your knees side-to-side.

title: Single knee to chest stretch
description: While Lying on your back, hold your knee and gently pull it up towards your chest.

title: Pelvic Tilt
description: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Next, arch your low back and then flatten it repeatedly. Your pelvis should tilt forward and back during the movement. Move through a comfortable range of motion.

title: Double knee to chest stretch
description: While Lying on your back,  hold your knees and gently pull them up towards your chest.

title: Cat and Camel
description: While on your hands and knees in a crawl position, raise up your back and arch it towards the ceiling. Next return to a lowered position and arch your back the opposite direction.

title: Abdominal Bracing
description: While lying on your back, tighten your stomach muscles as you draw your navel down towards the floor.

title: Prone on elbows
description: Lying face down, slowly press up and prop yourself up on your elbows.

title: Child Pose - Prayer Stretch
description: While in a crawl position, slowly lower your buttocks towards your feet until a stretch is felt along your back and or buttocks.

title: Quadruped alternate arm and leg
description: While in a crawling position, brace at your abdominals and then slowly lift a leg and opposite arm upwards. Maintain a level and stable pelvis and spine the entire time.

title: Elastic Band Rows
description: Holding elastic band with both hands, draw back the band as you bend your elbows. Keep your elbows near the side of your body.

title: Shoulder Abduction
description: While holding a wand/cane palm face up on the injured side and palm face down on the uninjured side, slowly raise up your injured arm to the side.

title: Table Slide - Flexion
description: Sitting in a chair, rest your injured arm on a table and gently slide it forward and then back.

title: Prone Y
description: Lying face down with your arms stretched out upwards as shown, slowly move your arms upward towards the ceiling as you squeeze your shoulder blades downward and towards your spine.

title: Sidelying External Rotation - ER
description: Lie on your side with your elbow bent and rested on your side. Next, draw up the your arm from the ground towards the ceiling. Place a rolled up towel under your elbow if advised by your clinician.

title: Sidelying Internal Rotation Stretch
description: Start by lying on your side with the affected arm on the bottom.Your affected arm should be bent at the elbow and forearm pointed upwards towards the ceiling as shown.Next, use your unaffected arm to gently draw your affected forearm towards the table or bed for an inward stretch.

title: Wall Push Ups
description: Standing at a wall, place your arms out in front of you with your elbows straigh so that your hands just reach the wall.  Next, bend your elbows slowly to bring your chest closer to the wall. Maintain your feet planted on the ground the entire time.

title: Elastic band bilateral horizontal abduction
description: While holding an elastic band with your elbows straight and in front of your body, pull your arms apart and towards the side.

title: Scapular protraction - free weight
description: Lie on your back holding a small free weight or soup can with your arm extended out in front of your body and towards the ceiling. While keeping your elbow straight, protract your shoulders forward towards the ceiling and then lower back down in a control motion.Do not allow your shoulder to raise towards your ears.

title: Elastic band Bilateral external rotation
description: While holding an elastic band with your elbows bent, pull your hands away from your stomach area. Keep  your elbows near the side of your body.

title: Bicep Curls
description: With your arm at your side, draw up your hand by bending at the elbow. Ensure your palm is facing up at all times.

title: Elastic Band Tricep
description: attach elastic band to top of door. Start with elbow bent and holding the band, then pull band downwards to extend elbow.

title: Elbow Flexion/Extension
description: Bend your elbow upwards and then lower to straighten position and repeat.

title: Elbow Flexion Stretch
description: Place your elbow on a table, using a towel under your elbow for cushion, use your other hand to bend the elbow into a more bent position.

title: Upright Elbow Tricep Extension
description: Extend your elbow above your head while holding weight, maintain your upper arm in the upward direction and only bend at the elbow.

title: Bent Over Tricep Curls
description: While standing, bend over and support your self with your uninjured arm. With your affected arm and elbow at your side, extend your elbow as you straighten your arm as shown. Keep your elbow at your side then entire time.

title: Elastic Band Bicep Curls - Hammer Curl
description: With your arm at your side holding an elastic band, draw up your hand by bending at the elbow. Keep your palm facing sideways the entire time.

title: Elbow Extension Stretch
description: While lying on your back, rest your elbow on a small rolled up towel.  Next, allow gravity to assist in stretching your elbow towards a more straightened position.

title: Elastic Band Triceps
description: Start by holding an elastic band across your chest with the unaffected arm. Next, pull the band downward with the other arm so that the elbow goes from a bent position to a straightened position as shown.

title: Supine Elbow Tricep Extension
description: While lying on your back, extend your elbow as shown while holding a free weight. Maintain your upper arm in an upward direction and only bend and straighten at your elbow.
